articles.description: Hakim Ziyech celebrated his birthday with a goal as Chelsea won 2-0 at Middlesbrough to book their place in the semi-finals of the FA Cup
articles.content:
Uncertainty and confusion have made an unwelcome intrusion into Chelseas world but, for the moment at least, they show no signs of encroaching on to the pitch.

articles.title: Vini Raman looks dreamy in a white lace gown for wedding with cricketer Glenn Maxwell. Pics here - India Today
articles.description: Vini Raman wore a beautiful white lace gown with a deep-back V cut for her wedding with Glenn Maxwell.

articles.title: 'We could see him opening and Virat at no.3': Jaffer backs India domestic star to open alongside Faf du Plessis for RCB - Hindustan Times
